95530.「うん？ ワガハイに 何か用ガニ？<yesno><case 1><close><: Yeah? What do you want with I. Gunny?<yesno><case 1><close><case2><break><case_cancel><break>

95531.「そうガニか。 \n うーん。しかし 返事が来ないガニ……。\n<br>\n「ム:
So Gani.Hmmm. But I haven't received any
reply. I should have asked master to write a
letter.

95532.<icon_exc>「おお！ アンタ かばん工房の使いの人ガニか！\n 待ってい:
Oh! You are the messenger crab from the bag workshop? I've been waiting for you. Ganippo, the owner of the letter, means I. What?The
craftsman was at a loss for words? Sorry, Gunny. I didn't explain well enough. Scissors means this hand. The mule bought a new bag to
go gathering materials with the master, but when he grabbed it with these scissors, it snapped and ruined it. So I was looking for a
new bag that is resistant to blades. That's why I want you to tell this story to the bag maker. I'm counting on you.

95533.「ワガハイのハサミでも 破れない かばんを\n 作ってほしいガニ。ジュレットの町:
I want you to tell the bag makers in Julet
Town that I want them to make bags that won't
tear even with my scissors.

95534.「おお！\n 今 必要な材料を 集めているんガニな。\n よろしく頼むガニ。:
Oh! Now you are gathering the necessary
materials. I'm looking forward to working with
you.

95535.<icon_exc>「おおっ！ まさか\n もう かばんが できあがったガニか！:
<icon_exc>Oh, wow! Don't tell me you've already finished
the bag?

95536.「まだ 作っているところガニね。\n 楽しみガニー。:
I'm still working on it Gunny. I'm looking
forward to it.

95537.「うおお！ これが ワガハイのかばん！\n うれしいガニー。\n さっそく 身に:
Wow! This is the bag of I! Gunny is so happy.
Gunny puts it on immediately.

95538.「うおお！ なんという かばんガニ！ \n まさに パーフェクト！！\n ワガハ:
Wow! What a bag crab!Exactly par Fecto! I am so impressed with this crab! Whoever made this is a first-class craftsman! I will send a
letter of thanks and payment to Julet's workshop later.

95539.<icon_exc>「そうガニ。グレン城下町の モンスター酒場に\n モモヨとい:
Yes, I have a friend named Flameman at the Monster Tavern in Glen Castle Town. I'd like you to stop by and talk to him. She also wants
a bag. I think this craftsman can make her bag.

95540.ガニッポのかばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><c: Would you like me to give you Ganippo's Bag?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close>

95542.ガニッポは かばんのベルトを\nおそるおそる ハサミでつかみ 手を通してみた。\:
Ganippo grabs the belt of the bag with a pair of scissors and puts his hand through it. The bag seemed to fit Ganippo's body.Ganippo
scratched and clipped the fabric of the bag with the scissors, but there was not a scratch on the bag!

95543.「グレン城下町の モンスター酒場に\n モモヨという ワガハイの友人がいるガニ。:
I have a friend named Flameman at the Monster Tavern in Glen Castle Town. I want you to listen to her story. She also wanted a bag. I
think this craftsman can make a bag that she can wear.

95544.「かばんも 用意できたし\n 素材集めの準備も ばっちりガニ。\n ご主人様ー。:
My bag is ready, and I'm ready to collect
materials. Master. I can't wait to go to
Gunny's.

83032.「水が恋しいガニ……。恋しいガニよ……。\n ここを抜け出して 川まで行きたいガ:
I miss the water, crab. I'm a crab that misses the water. I want to get out of here and go to the river. I've had enough of land. But I'll
be patient. Master told me not to go out without permission. I'll keep my word.
